O! The Embrace!

field sermon

the gentle hum of distant portals

ripened fruit

ten thousand names

return of 200 rotations

looking for

room

wake

sinkhole

somewhere on sheltowee trace

beckoning me back

returning to normal

in this one

silver maple way

what is a quilt

Tentacular Regeneration
